siyalla heliwi hamaraya.supiri niwasa ahasin kada pathwuwe natha.alage karunawen melage maga penwimen eya santhaka wu bawa prasiddha rahasaki.sinhala ingrisiyen kiyawa sihalun rawatiya nohaka.maha bankuwa klin kala un me aanduwa thibena thuru klin kala nohakiya.sarala minisada ratata kelawunath aanduwa ada gena yama ekama abhipraya kara ganimin me kunu thawaragena dasatha ganda gaswamin amuda gataya thada kara ganna bawak pene.bankuwa ,waraya ,guwan thota,pamanak nowa janayage panchaskandhaya ho wikuna thama pawathma thahawuru kara ganma mowunge abhipraya wanneya.rawita kala ki de amathakaya.wenekak thaba thama supiri niwase nida gaththe ka samagada kiyath amathakaya.ape mudal nottuwe athsan kaleth amathaka wimakin wannata puluwana.ranilta siyallama wihiluwaki.mathi sabaye kalisam sakkuwata atha damagena kumak ho samaga wihilu karamin sitimata ohu abbahi wi atha.sirisena unnaheta paththara karaya paththara nobeduwoth aba saranaya.siyalu puwath los wanneya.aanduwe sessoda esemaya.hama ekagema athe sudu hunu baldiyak atha.mada thawara gath sanin fut not ekak dama sudu hunu thawarima owunage rajakariya wi atha.horu allannata horun balayata balayata path kala janaya anathaya.janaya andu en.ji.oo.dolar kakko unge anagathaya hada gathha.api wenuwen api kiya kiyanne untaya.
